title: if the level of the site is lower than the Datum Level prescribed by the Commissioner depending on topography and drainage aspects
clause_text: if the level of the site is lower than the Datum Level prescribed by the Commissioner depending on topography and drainage aspects. This shall not be less than reduced level of 27.55m of the Town Hall Datum; if situated within the funnel of vision marked on DP plan of D Ward;

source_pdf.text_snippet: if the level of the site is lower than the Datum Level prescribed by the Commissioner depending on topography and drainage aspects. This shall not be less than reduced level of 27.55m of the Town Hall
